column3: Add jdeps support and fix download up-to-date check
Add main entry-point and service to 01-hello-world example
Support large command line by using @argument option in java and javac

Add demo "02-testing" using --patch-module for executing tests

* Share IDEA run configurations
* Use $TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR in travis.yml

Add basic java.lang.module helper methods

Rename Basics.fileName(URI) to Basics.getFileName(URI)
Introduce ModuleInfo value class with parser and fail fast in substring
Rename destination option and add "." to the end of default Jar command
Remove not longer required export statement
Use ModuleFinder directly instead of the provided jar tool
Merge Command.java and JdkTool.java into Bach.java
Introduce nested builder for Project configuration
Introduce Util type containing static utilities and helpers
Let class Bach enclose Command, Util and other types
Add "Using Google Java Format as library" demo
Rename main() to apply() and cleanup

Major compilation unit refactoring

- Define static types outside of class Bach:
  o Command
  o Property
  o Util
  o Tool
- Remove support for Project/Group for now.
- Add `bach.properties` support.
Introduce Project and make base path a core property
Improve usage of Layout and introduce new constant: UNKNOWN
More features, less friction, JUnit Platform 1.4
Assemble external modules and activate test realm
Add extract "action" and support Maven as an external tool
Refactor Action, Tool and Utilities types
Extend scaffold project by a demo service
Support multiple values for single property
Add Property enum and Tool interface
Add run actions method and move build()
Introduce default tool action consuming remaining arguments
Add project model with basic compilation support
Build and launch minimal test project
Add paths to string joining support
Introduce bach.offline property and add convenience helpers
Introduce Tool interface with google-java-"format" support
Remove scaffold action with all assets
Add generated single-file source-code program: Bach.java
Split static and type import blocks
Set logger level to ALL when "-Debug" mode is active
Add synchronize() and default SYNC action
Prepare Project setup and improve initialization logging
Add and use property enumeration to Project class
Refactor JigsawBuilder in preparation of a BUILD action
Move modules() finder to Project class
Add `--module-path` generating factory to Project class
Sort classes in a OS-agnostic manner
Try to resolve a path property as a URI first
Emit better error message on test run failures
Move synchronizing logic into dedicated Synchronizer class
Add support for javac release and enable-preview options
Add various utilities and convenience run() methods
Improve summary by emitting size and modular information
Don't filter regular files by default
Introduce initial main and test realm support
Extract module-related methods into a dedicated class
Find external modules names for each realm
Emit provided tools and better argument -> tool conversion
Support running external tools via Java's process API
Add direct test run on the module-path
Add direct test run on the class-path
Read project's module-info.java files only once
Improve exception handling and introduce '-Debug=[true|false]' mode
Implement new Bach API: help() and version()
Introduce home and work path properties
Extend Bach API with build() and validate() methods
Require generated Bach.java to compile before copy
Introduce Transfer class dealing with getting files via HTTP
Add dedicated invocation handler re-using default configuration values
Add Command: a command-line program argument list builder
Fix exception chain handling and respect compiled configuration
Support file schema and add convenient static transfer method
Improve module and module source path computation
Print all library modules after resolving
Merge Domain and nested types in Bach.java
Defer execution of command line actions
Add multi-adder overload delegating to a custom visitor
Back to direct command execution in Jigsaw as well
Fix javadoc generation for multi-release projects
Introduce ModuleInfoReference as a first-class domain model type
Compute realm's module path in project model

Add test projects based on Jigsaw Quick Start Guide

https://openjdk.java.net/projects/jigsaw/quick-start

Refactoring

- simplify creation of realms
- rename ModuleUnit to ModuleSourceUnit
Replace Property class with typed values in Project model
Move module source path generator to Modules
Unroll source-related maps in module to explicit Source type
Convert boolean property to "flag" enum in Project.Source
Patch main sources into test modules

List all main modules, generate dot files

Issue #77
Run Version.java w/o args to print current version
Quote argument values in shell scripts

Auto-require module `java.net.http`

Resources exposes types of module `java.net.http`:
- HttpClient in its constructor/factory parameters
- HttpResponse as the return type of its head() method
Create missing target's parent directories and propagate exceptions
Use Maven Group ID and version to determine the associated repository
Use Resources and Maven helpers to resolve missing dependencies
Allow custom timeout value for head requests
Collect and emit all tool invocations as part of the summary
Add main method and version constant
Add template-based build program generation support

Implement main program with initial actions

- build (noop)
- project
- version
Apply Google Java Format to all Java source files
Fix indentation and emit all valid entry-points
Move summary creation into dedicated method and store as markdown
Introduce Project.Path registry and Resources helper class
Scan for module declaration in "java" and "module" context
Extend Realm with a set of modifiers
Add copy() and unzip() helpers to Paths
Introduce Structure, Realm, and Unit types
Move project's folder component into structure type
Record all log entries and all simple text messages
Create log file in summary task
Introduce project builder with basic auto-config support
Introduce modules helper with module-internal tests
Use ROOT locale when formatting decimal numbers
Format numbers in test as well
Sort JAR files before listing them
Overload run() method accepting an explicit ToolProvider
Introduce dedicated bootstrap program performing  builds
Extend Paths with tree walker helper
Update model to use the new source type
Extend demo project with multi-release "demo.shell" module
Only compile normal modules and fix javadoc call
Read and use version from project properties file

Read deployment configuration from properties

Closes #92
Sort modules by number of "internal" requires for compilation
Pre-sort units by their number of requires to other units
Remove Unit.Type enum and make Maven POM file configurable
Fix path to string with star mapping

Move information logging into Bach.java

Here, internal components (like tools) can be accessed.
Consume custom library instance in structure factory

Read all project properties from "project-info.java.properties"

Closes #98
Read all required foundation tool provider modules

Replace resolver class with library logic

Closes #93
Move Property enumeration into a top-level type
Extract module resolving methods into dedicated class

Add Maven Central link factory

Closes #99
Add "directory tree" copy, delete, and walk methods
Emit content of library folder before compiling
Move template-related features to dedicated type

Extend deployment record with a global pom.xml template component

Part of issue #101

Introduce type-safe Configuration class, Java Bean-style

Addresses #104
Use new Configuration type in build program

Remove Property type and support of `src/project-info.java.properties`

Closes #104

Generate JShell scripts for Maven-related commands

Closes #102
Add "tool" action to Bach.java's main program
Replace Deployment by optional group property in Project
